name: @tsdiapi/jwt-auth

variables.name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
variables.description: The secret key used for signing JWT tokens

validate.errorMessage: JWT secret key must be at least 10 characters long.

variables.name: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
variables.description: JWT expiration time in minutes (default: 30 days)

inquirer.message: Enter your JWT expiration time in minutes:

validate.errorMessage: Expiration time must be a positive number.

variables.name: JWT_REFRESH_SECRET_KEY
variables.description: The secret key used for signing JWT refresh tokens

inquirer.message: Enter your JWT refresh secret key:

validate.errorMessage: JWT refresh secret key must be at least 10 characters long.

variables.name: JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRATION_TIME
variables.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in minutes (default: 90 days)

inquirer.message: Enter your JWT refresh expiration time in minutes:

validate.errorMessage: Refresh expiration time must be a positive number.

variables.name: JWT_ADMIN_SECRET
variables.description: The secret key used for signing up new admin users

variables.name: SESSION_SECRET
variables.description: The secret key used for signing up new session users

registration.pluginArgs: { guards: { admin: async (session: { adminId: string }) => { if (!session.adminId) { return 'Only administrators are allowed!'; } return true; } } }

generators.name: feature
generators.description: Generate a auth feature for the project
